thread.title: Wandering can be deadly for the growing number of US Alzheimer's patients. Here's how families can manage it. | Clayton News Photo Slideshows | news-daily.com
thread.title_full: Wandering can be deadly for the growing number of US Alzheimer's patients. Here's how families can manage it. | Clayton News Photo Slideshows | news-daily.com

author: Keerthi Vedantam, Data Work By Elena Cox
title: Wandering can be deadly for the growing number of US Alzheimer's patients. Here's how families can manage it. | Clayton News Photo Slideshows | news-daily.com
text:
[Tile](https://www.tile.com/) examined data to understand the prevalence of Alzheimer's, the dangers of wandering, and what families can do to avoid the problem.
Originally published on [tile.com](https://tile.com), part of the [BLOX Digital Content Exchange](https://www.bloxdigital.com/products_services/cen/).
